participant_1.background:
I will be helping my girlfriend prepare for the baby shower.
I keep up with my family but I am not always sure if they keep up with me.
i like tailgate parties.
i like fitness.
I spent my last birthday with my wife at a fancy restaurant, which was nice, but I would rather have gone to the Galapagos Islands again.

participant_2.background:
I've been in a relationship for 5 years, but I feel like I don't measure up to my partner's standards.
i tried to make it as an actor when i was younger.
i can t get enough gummy worms to satisfy my sweet tooth.
I wake up early to practice my music before my sister and niece and nephew wake up.
i love watching sitcoms on television.

content.text: Hey there! How are you today?
Doing well! Excited to be getting back to work after being on vacation.
That is nice! What do you do for work?
I am a fitness instructor at a gym.
Oh cool! I love going to the gym.
Me too! I am excited to get back to teaching classes.
I am sure your students are excited to have you back too!
I hope so! I am getting some new equipment in this week.
Oh cool! What kind of equipment?
A new treadmill and some new weights.
That is awesome! I love new equipment.
Me too! It makes the workouts more exciting.
I bet! I am glad you are excited to be getting back to work.
Thanks! I am always excited to get back to work.
That is great! I am sure your students are too.
